content: Hey guys I was working on a web3 lottery website and i didnt launch it yet due to financial issueso now I'll be selling the full source code if anyone is interested pls dm meSource code includes:-Backend (Smart contract)-frontendYou can deploy it on ethereum,polygon and other blockchain (I'll help you)|I'd help you to edit it and make it suitable for youPrice is only $200 add me on discord Alaks1 Preview:https://imgur.com/5ONKZkghttps://imgur.com/AToGQSw
